description: Try our easy to follow Crispy-Skinned Salmon & Bean Pasta Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crispy-Skinned Salmon & Bean Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pasta, beans and half the dressing in a serving bowl, tossing gently to coat. Top with radish and salmon. Scatter over capers and extra dill sprigs, drizzle with remaining dressing and serve with lemon halves.
